chart.description: Error rate on requests made to the endpoint
chart.name: Error rate
chart.programText:
A = data('spans.count', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and filter('sf_kind', 'SERVER') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*')) and (not filter('sf_serviceMesh', '*')) and filter('sf_error', 'false') and filter('sf_operation', '*'), rollup='rate').sum().publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('spans.count', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and filter('sf_kind', 'SERVER') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*')) and (not filter('sf_serviceMesh', '*')) and filter('sf_operation', '*'), rollup='rate').sum().publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (100*(B-A)/B).publish(label='C')

chart.description: Requests/sec processed by the service
chart.name: Request rate
chart.programText: C = data('service.request.count', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*')), rollup='rate').sum(by=['sf_service']).publish(label='C')

chart.description: Requests/sec processed by the service
chart.name: Request rate
chart.programText: A = data('service.request.count', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*')), rollup='rate').sum().publish(label='A')

chart.description: Requests/sec processed by the endpoint
chart.name: Request rate
chart.programText: A = data('spans.count', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and filter('sf_kind', 'SERVER', 'CONSUMER') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*')) and (not filter('sf_serviceMesh', '*')) and filter('sf_operation', '*'), rollup='rate').sum().publish(label='A')

chart.description: Distribution of service response time with median (p50), 90th and 99th percentiles
chart.name: Request Latency distribution
chart.programText:
A = data('service.request.duration.ns.median', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*'))).max(by=['sf_service']).publish(label='A')
B = data('service.request.duration.ns.p90', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*'))).max(by=['sf_service']).publish(label='B')
C = data('service.request.duration.ns.p99', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*'))).max(by=['sf_service']).publish(label='C')

chart.description: 90th percentile response time by endpoint of the service
chart.name: Request Latency (p90) by endpoint
chart.programText: C = data('spans.duration.ns.p90', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and filter('sf_kind', 'SERVER', 'CONSUMER') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*')) and (not filter('sf_serviceMesh', '*'))).max(by=['sf_service', 'sf_operation', 'sf_httpMethod'], allow_missing=['sf_httpMethod']).publish(label='C')

chart.description: Error rate on requests made to the service
chart.name: Error rate
chart.programText:
A = data('service.request.count', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and filter('sf_error', 'false') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*')), rollup='delta', extrapolation='zero').sum(by=['sf_service']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('service.request.count', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*')), rollup='delta').sum(by=['sf_service']).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (100*(B-A)/B).publish(label='C')

chart.description: Error rate on requests made to the endpoint
chart.name: Error rate
chart.programText:
A = data('spans.count', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and filter('sf_kind', 'SERVER') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*')) and (not filter('sf_serviceMesh', '*')) and filter('sf_error', 'false') and filter('sf_operation', '*'), rollup='rate').sum(by=['sf_service', 'sf_operation', 'sf_httpMethod'], allow_missing=['sf_httpMethod']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('spans.count', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and filter('sf_kind', 'SERVER') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*')) and (not filter('sf_serviceMesh', '*')) and filter('sf_operation', '*'), rollup='rate').sum(by=['sf_service', 'sf_operation', 'sf_httpMethod'], allow_missing=['sf_httpMethod']).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (100*(B-A)/B).publish(label='C')

chart.description: Requests/sec processed by each endpoint of the service
chart.name: Request rate by endpoint
chart.programText: A = data('spans.count', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and filter('sf_kind', 'SERVER', 'CONSUMER') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*')) and (not filter('sf_serviceMesh', '*')), rollup='rate').sum(by=['sf_service', 'sf_operation', 'sf_httpMethod'], allow_missing=['sf_httpMethod']).publish(label='A')

chart.description: 90th percentile response time
chart.name: Request Latency (p90)
chart.programText: A = data('spans.duration.ns.p90', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and filter('sf_kind', 'SERVER', 'CONSUMER') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*')) and (not filter('sf_serviceMesh', '*')) and filter('sf_operation', '*')).max().publish(label='A')

chart.description: Requests/sec processed by the endpoint
chart.name: Request rate
chart.programText: A = data('spans.count', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and filter('sf_kind', 'SERVER', 'CONSUMER') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*')) and (not filter('sf_serviceMesh', '*')) and filter('sf_operation', '*'), rollup='rate').sum(by=['sf_service', 'sf_operation', 'sf_httpMethod'], allow_missing=['sf_httpMethod']).publish(label='A')

chart.description: Error rate on requests made to endpoints of the service
chart.name: Error rate by endpoint
chart.programText:
A = data('spans.count', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and filter('sf_kind', 'SERVER', 'CONSUMER') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*')) and (not filter('sf_serviceMesh', '*')) and filter('sf_error', 'false'), rollup='rate').sum(by=['sf_service', 'sf_operation', 'sf_httpMethod'], allow_missing=['sf_httpMethod']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('spans.count', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and filter('sf_kind', 'SERVER', 'CONSUMER') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*')) and (not filter('sf_serviceMesh', '*')), rollup='rate').sum(by=['sf_service', 'sf_operation', 'sf_httpMethod'], allow_missing=['sf_httpMethod']).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (100*(B-A)/B).publish(label='C')

chart.description: Distribution of endpoint response time with median (p50), 90th and 99th percentiles
chart.name: Request Latency distribution
chart.programText:
A = data('spans.duration.ns.median', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and filter('sf_kind', 'SERVER', 'CONSUMER') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*')) and (not filter('sf_serviceMesh', '*')) and filter('sf_operation', '*')).max(by=['sf_service', 'sf_operation', 'sf_httpMethod'], allow_missing=['sf_httpMethod']).publish(label='A')
B = data('spans.duration.ns.p90', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and filter('sf_kind', 'SERVER', 'CONSUMER') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*')) and (not filter('sf_serviceMesh', '*')) and filter('sf_operation', '*')).max(by=['sf_service', 'sf_operation', 'sf_httpMethod'], allow_missing=['sf_httpMethod']).publish(label='B')
C = data('spans.duration.ns.p99', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and filter('sf_kind', 'SERVER', 'CONSUMER') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*')) and (not filter('sf_serviceMesh', '*')) and filter('sf_operation', '*')).max(by=['sf_service', 'sf_operation', 'sf_httpMethod'], allow_missing=['sf_httpMethod']).publish(label='C')

chart.description: Most erroneous service endpoints (1-minute error rate average)
chart.name: Top endpoints by error rate
chart.programText:
A = data('spans.count', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and filter('sf_kind', 'SERVER', 'CONSUMER') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*')) and (not filter('sf_serviceMesh', '*')) and filter('sf_error', 'false'), rollup='delta').sum(by=['sf_service', 'sf_operation', 'sf_httpMethod'], allow_missing=['sf_httpMethod']).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('spans.count', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and filter('sf_kind', 'SERVER', 'CONSUMER') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*')) and (not filter('sf_serviceMesh', '*')), rollup='delta').sum(by=['sf_service', 'sf_operation', 'sf_httpMethod'], allow_missing=['sf_httpMethod']).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (100*(B-A)/B).mean(over='1m').top(count=10).publish(label='C')

chart.description: Most active service endpoints (1-minute requests/sec average)
chart.name: Top endpoints by request rate
chart.programText: A = data('spans.count', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and filter('sf_kind', 'SERVER', 'CONSUMER') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*')) and (not filter('sf_serviceMesh', '*')), rollup='rate').sum(by=['sf_service', 'sf_operation', 'sf_httpMethod'], allow_missing=['sf_httpMethod']).mean(over='1m').top(count=10).publish(label='A')

chart.description: Error rate on requests made to the service
chart.name: Error rate
chart.programText:
A = data('service.request.count', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and filter('sf_error', 'false') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*')), rollup='delta', extrapolation='zero').sum().publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('service.request.count', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*')), rollup='delta').sum().publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (100*(B-A)/B).publish(label='C')

chart.description: 90th percentile response time
chart.name: Request Latency (p90)
chart.programText: A = data('service.request.duration.ns.p90', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*') and (not filter('sf_dimensionalized', '*'))).max().publish(label='A')

chart.description: CPU Utilization of the service hosts
chart.name: Host CPU usage
chart.programText: A = data('cpu.utilization', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*')).publish(label='A')

chart.description: Storage utilization, in bytes, of the Kubernetes pods for this service
chart.name: Pod disk usage
chart.programText: A = data('container_fs_usage_bytes', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*')).sum(by=['kubernetes_pod_uid', 'container_id']).publish(label='A')

chart.description: Cumulative network utilization of the service hosts
chart.name: Host network usage
chart.programText: A = data('network.total', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*'), rollup='rate').publish(label='A')

options.markdown:
Kubernetes Pod Metrics


Key metrics from the Kubernetes pod(s) that power this service.
Metrics will only populate these charts if your service is running in Kubernetes and your SignalFx Smart Agent is configured to monitor your Kubernetes environment.

chart.description: Disk utilization of the service hosts
chart.name: Host disk usage
chart.programText: A = data('disk.summary_utilization', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*')).publish(label='A')

chart.description: CPU utilization of the containers in the Kubernetes pods of this service
chart.name: Pod CPU usage
chart.programText: A = data('container_cpu_percent', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*'), rollup='rate').sum(by=['kubernetes_pod_uid', 'container_id']).publish(label='A')

options.markdown:
Host Metrics


Key system-level metrics for the host(s) that power this service

chart.description: Memory usage in bytes of the containers in the Kubernetes pods of this service, and their utilization (if a memory limit is set for the pod)
chart.name: Pod memory usage

publishLabelOptions.displayName: container_spec_memory_limit_bytes - Maximum by kubernetes_pod_uid,container_id - Exclude x < 0
publishLabelOptions.label: B

chart.programText:
A = data('container_memory_usage_bytes', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*')).mean(by=['kubernetes_pod_uid', 'container_id']).publish(label='A')
B = data('container_spec_memory_limit_bytes', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*')).max(by=['kubernetes_pod_uid', 'container_id']).above(0, inclusive=True).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = (100*A/B).publish(label='C')

chart.description: Memory utilization of the service hosts
chart.name: Host memory usage
chart.programText: A = data('memory.utilization', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*')).publish(label='A')

chart.description: Saturation of the service hosts (max of CPU, memory and disk utilization)
chart.name: Host saturation
chart.programText:
f = filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*')
A = data('cpu.utilization', filter=f).publish(label='A', enable=False)
B = data('memory.utilization', filter=f).publish(label='B', enable=False)
C = data('disk.summary_utilization', filter=f).publish(label='C', enable=False)
D = max(A, B, C).sum(by='host').publish(label='D')

chart.description: Network utilization in bytes (in and out) of the Kubernetes pods for this service
chart.name: Pod network utilization (bytes/sec)
chart.programText:
A = data('pod_network_receive_bytes_total', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*'), rollup='rate', extrapolation='zero').sum(by=['kubernetes_pod_uid', 'container_id']).publish(label='A')
B = data('pod_network_transmit_bytes_total', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*'), rollup='rate', extrapolation='zero').sum(by=['kubernetes_pod_uid', 'container_id']).publish(label='B')

options.markdown:
Host Metrics


Key system-level metrics for the host(s) that power this service

chart.description: Network utilization in bytes (in and out) of the Kubernetes pods for this service

B = data('pod_network_transmit_bytes_total', filter=filter('sf_environment', '*') and filter('sf_service', '*'), rollup='rate', extrapolation='zero').sum(by=['kubernetes_pod_uid', 'container_id']).publish(label='B')
